subject: Re: Samba TP6?
body:
Andrew,

 > Perhaps tridge can detail the steps he required to have GPOs working
 > (before I got MMC going). 

yep, I'd be delighted to. I'm travelling at the moment however, and
right now I need to sleep, then tomorrow I fly home. When I've
recovered I'd love to work with some people trying out GPOs.

Cheers, Tridge
